CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Treatment Initiated stage positioned above or below the Treatment Recommended stage?
SRP.A: The Treatment Initiated stage is positioned {below} the Treatment Recommended stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed is {837}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Recommended?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Recommended is {489}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {2165}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Completed, with a value of {417}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {490} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing?
SC.A: Decreased by {838} Patients from stage Initial Consultation to stage Diagnostic Testing.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated?
SC.A: Decreased by {11} Patients from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 663? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Consultation} stage has {2165}, the {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {1327}, the {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {837}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 447? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 483 and 663? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to {Diagnosis Confirmed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, or from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to {Diagnostic Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated, from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, or from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to stage {Diagnostic Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Consultation} and {Diagnostic Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Recommended} and {Treatment Initiated} stages.
